page.title: 08OCCUPATIONS
page.content: Out of{35 people}altogether in the South End, 12 of them farm full time or part_time or rent their land out to other tenants.Some of the farmers fish part-time as well making a total of{15 people fishing or {farming.}David Sinclair, a farmer, is also a{part-time postman.}Mr Thomas Rendall is the{school bus driver}for the South End children. He makes two trips a day, five times a week, and also farms. Because work here is limited to mainly fishing and farming 3 people are{unemployed.}5 people are {retired}from farming and they rent out their land. 4 people have{holiday {houses}for renting to tourists during the holidays in the Summer. Some people like Mr Rendall don't own a farm but live and work there for somebody else.
